refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_enabled ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether GnomeVFS was compiled with SSL support.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if GnomeVFS was compiled with SSL support, otherwise FALSE.

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_create ()
refsect2.para: Creates an SSL socket connection at handle_return to host using port port.

listitem.simpara: pointer to a GnmoeVFSSSL struct, which will contain an allocated GnomeVFSSSL object on return.
string indicating the host to establish an SSL connection with
the port number to connect to
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_create_from_fd ()
refsect2.para: Try to establish an SSL connection over the file descriptor fd.

listitem.simpara: pointer to a GnmoeVFSSSL struct, which will contain an allocated GnomeVFSSSL object on return.
file descriptior to try and establish an SSL connection over
a GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_read ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult gnome_vfs_ssl_read (GnomeVFSSSL *ssl, gpointer buffer, GnomeVFSFileSize bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_read);
refsect2.para: Read bytes bytes of data from the SSL socket ssl into buffer.

listitem.simpara: SSL socket to read data from
allocated buffer of at least bytes bytes to be read into
number of bytes to read from ssl into buffer
pointer to a GnomeVFSFileSize, will contain the number of bytes actually read from the socket on return.
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_write ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult gnome_vfs_ssl_write (GnomeVFSSSL *ssl, gconstpointer buffer, GnomeVFSFileSize bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_written);
refsect2.para: Write bytes bytes of data from buffer to ssl.

listitem.simpara: SSL socket to write data to
data to write to the socket
number of bytes from buffer to write to ssl
pointer to a GnomeVFSFileSize, will contain the number of bytes actually written to the socket on return.
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_destroy ()
refsect2.para: Free resources used by ssl and close the connection.

listitem.simpara: SSL socket to be closed and destroyed

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_ssl_to_socket ()
refsect2.para: Wrapper an SSL socket inside a standard GnomeVFSSocket.

listitem.simpara: SSL socket to convert into a standard socket
a newly allocated GnomeVFSSocket corresponding to ssl.
